I think it is im important to and significant to discuss and mention the problem that we have with our friends and with our relatives as well as the people that we trust. >> Mhm. Great.

samples.question: And do you think that it is better to talk to friends and not family about problems?
samples.transcript: >> well this is such a challenging question of course but friends are friends, families are families. I I think some of the things should be shared with the family members. For example, I can mention for example if if you are in in terms of budget if you do not have money for example for instance you need to consult with your family members. Of course your father and your mother I am talking about the parents are the people that you can trust the most and also you can borrow the money that you need from the family members. However, or nonetheless, people like friends maybe we we trust them less. Of course, when we we wanted to compare it to family members, they are less trustable. So, I do believe that when it comes to friends, we should actually share the ideas. For example, we can spend time with them, we can go to restaurant, we can hang out with them or maybe we can discuss very little challenging problems, not the the most difficult ones. >> Agreed.

samples.question: And is it always a good idea to tell lots of people about a problem?
samples.transcript: >> people get frustrated when we talk a lot about the problem. And of course when it comes to overtalking, people maybe do not have the ears to to listen for us. So listen to us. So I do believe that we should actually take a look at how people edit how people's attitude are and how people's attitude is and the way the way that they are actually having manner and also how they they they tolerate us and how they they wanted to be a sounding board to us or not. So it does have an important role. nevertheless, some people may talk to their friends and also some other people regarding the problems that they have, regarding the difficulties, regarding the suffering points that they have in their lives.
